Action.author: dbluhm
Action.body: Libsodium issues are known. I am trying to open up discussion with the community on possible solutions. I'll probably bump this back to the next Sprint.

Action.author: stevegoob
Action.body: Turns out that libsodium is causing issues with ubuntu 18.04 too. libsodium18 is no longer supported in ubuntu but is required for the libindy package
